website_summaries.verdict: Perfect combination of support and durability for the ultimate orthopedic pet bed along with a luxurious memory foam mattress.
pros: Contours to each pet's body for maximum comfort and orthopedic support
Offers good quality at a fair price and pets can easily change sleeping positions because of large size
cons: Skid bumps on bottom of bed might come off and cover is oftentimes hard to get back on after washing
Smaller dogs might have trouble climbing in and out

website_summaries.verdict: This top-rated model is perfect for those needing an inexpensive waterproof dog bed.
pros: Includes zippered, washable cover for easy cleaning
Built-in rubber grips on bottom of the bed stop sliding
Available in small, medium, and large
cons: A few customers had issues with mold and mildew

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed! My dog LOVES this bed. Really good quality at a fair price. My only complaint, is that I didn't order TWO, because now I have to carry it up and down the stairs everyday because she's sad without it. She's not even sleeping in my bed anymore!... Not sure how I feel about that, I miss my cuddle bug! Lol Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KimmieKatt

customer_reviews.title: great bed for an aging pup
customer_reviews.text: This is very comfortable and a huge upgrade from the $50 pet store bed my dog previously had (which after 3 years was majorly lumpy and uncomfortable). This seems like it will last much longer. I had trouble getting the right size, however and ended up with a larger bed than she needs. This photo shows my 50-pound lab mix curled up in the corner of the 40"x35"x4" size bed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Machi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bed for my ole girl
customer_reviews.text: This bed is amazing! My dog (Great Dane/Lab mix) loves it. She's 14 and was in need of a bed that was better on her aging joints. She's had occasional accidents and this cover truly is waterproof. When you wash the cover, there's no shrinkage, so that was a pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Hiniker

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bed based upon the reviews that spoke so highly of the product. I received my order today, and my dog absolutely loved it at first, but then she had an accident and it all went downhill from there. This product is not at all waterproof as it seeped through the cover and into the mattress onto the other side. When I removed the cover, the mattress was drenched and stained and retained an odor. I'm going to attempt at cleaning the mattress, but this was most likely money wasted. I am completely disappointed and I'm upset that I spent so much money on a product that did not deliver what it advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart and made a huge mess the first time it was washed!!!
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like a really nice dog bed at first. My Labradoodle loves it too, problem is just went to wash it and almost all the little black rubber/plastic anti-skid bumps on the bottom of the cover came off in the washing machine and went everywhere in the washer tub and all over the floor when I took it out to put in the dryer!!
customer_reviews.author: BH21281

customer_reviews.title: great bed terrible cover unusable after one wash
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this bed. So much so that I was considering purchasing several more (at the large size). Bed is great, cover is great, however when you wash it according to directions it is impossible to put back on the bed. To be honest I would love to get my money back on this bed and I never think that about most of my purchases. I always figure "buyer beware". But this is an expensive purchase and after one wash (of the cover) according to directions the product is unusable. If anyone has purchased similar beds that don't have this limitation please let me know. I'm in the market for good beds.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT Waterproof- cover will shrink after washing and no longer fut
customer_reviews.text: Like others, I was impressed at first until we had our first accident that leaked right into the memory foam. I've washed cover on medium but it now has shrunk so much after several washings that it no longer covers the foam. Do not buy if you need a waterproof cover for your memory foam bed. May want to buy another even if waterproof isn't important because the cover will shrink after a few washes.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Not even one star worthy cheap material
customer_reviews.text: I would have given less than one star if possible. The foam interior is cheap and has fallen apart after less than a months use by a 5 lb dog. Even tho the waterproof cover works for small accidents you can see from the pictures that through the cover the dog can still scratch away at this foam material that is used. I would never buy a product from this company again I have never had a dog bed fall apart faster than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Guy L.

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product was not waterproof as advertised. I have a geriatric German Shepherd mix named Cleo and we love Cleo very much but she has accidents sometimes due to her age. The cover leaked through to the foam saturating it and rendering this bed useless. It can not be cleaned and now it is trash.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ireland

customer_reviews.title: Comfy dog bed with removable, washable cover.
customer_reviews.text: We love this bed comfort-wise. It’s perfect for our 90 lb golden retriever. Love that the cover is removable and washable. The only problem we have is the the zipper broke off when we were carefully putting the cover back on and we’ve only been using the bed for a couple months. Now we can’t zip the cover onto the mattress with no zipper. I can’t figure out how to contact the company about this. :(
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Great with one fatal flaw!
customer_reviews.text: Actually love the bed, but had a pretty serious problem with it. Washed the cover for the first time (cleaned up great!), and when I went to put the cover back on the bed the zipper pull didn't stop at the end of the zipper and pulled right off. Didn't pull it too hard or anything like that, there was no stop for the zipper it just pulled right off of the zipper. Cover can never be put back on now, and according to Amazon the return window closed YESTERDAY! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: R. hackmann

customer_reviews.title: Huge and solid. NOT waterproof!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the extra large and it is HUGE! I could almost sleep on it. It quickly expanded to about 4". The cover is nice, doesn't have a plastic feel at all. The dog had an accident and I realized it's more like a scotch guard water repellant. Cleaned up easy but I'm not sure how well it would protect repeated accidents, I may get a vinyl mattress cover to adapt. My small dog immediately took over it lol! Update...definitely NOT waterproof. My dog leaked in her sleep and it soaked through to the memory foam. :-(.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Meinzinger

customer_reviews.title: Relief for my arthritic dog!
customer_reviews.text: I could never get my dog to use a dog bed at all. He would use a blanket, or would sleep with me. But now that he's 14 years old, he has gotten arthritis. He can no longer safely get down from my bed, and the blanket on the floor seemed to be leaving him in pain. So I decided to give this one a try, hoping I could get him to use it. It was easy! I think it was a combination of the larger size, and the lack of an outer "wall". He loves it, and I do believe it has lessened his pain from the arthritis. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Always Better Challenge

customer_reviews.title: Incredible purchase, coming back for another!
customer_reviews.text: Huge, awesome bed! Buy, buy, buy it!! I didn't have this bad boy set up for more than 5 minutes before my rough collie was on it. Snapped a photo, and she was out cold a few minutes after! Lulu is a big dog, 50+ pounds, has an extra half foot near her butt. Bed is so big it doesn't fit on my camera. Seriously, if you're considering a dog bed, get this one. It's massive, it's soft, it's fluffy, it's perfect. I'll be getting another when my other collie is old enough to know that not everything is meant to be eaten.
customer_reviews.author: taspeer

customer_reviews.title: Supportive bed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one for my dog who likes to hang out in the basement and liked it enough to order another one for upstairs. It's nice-looking, the cover fits well, it's supportive but not hard and returns to its original shape when the dog get up, so the memory foam doesn't seem to be compacting. The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars is because I haven't had the beds that long so I don't know how they'll hold up long-term. I haven't washed the covers yet either, but so far I'm very pleased! Also, although the instructions say 24 hours for the bed to expand after opening, it took perhaps an hour for each of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Tosa_Lori

customer_reviews.title: Misleading pictures and description of bed , cover is not zippered, falls off .......
customer_reviews.text: The bed is soft, but the cover is not as advertised it is a thin , elastic cover that does not stay on the mattress. The ad says it is a zippered cover, Quality is not as advertised, poorly manufactured. To bad, as the bed is soft, and our dog likes it. If only the cover was as advertised, we would have a entirely different review. Update 10/7/2019 I contacted the manufacturer via phone, they refunded the cost of the bed, rather than send a cover. Raised the rating to two stars, as they responded two thw issue, but would rather of had a cover sent.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R. Schiffman

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof Cover is a great thing!
customer_reviews.text: I have a senior dog who occasionally wets her bed. I was so happy to find this bed with the waterproof cover and the option to purchase additional covers. I was worried she wouldn’t like it because it wasn’t a cuddle bed like her old one but she took right to it. I have only washed the cover once, as I keep a blanket on it to help protect it, so I’m not sure how the cover will stand up to repeated washing. I did discover today that the quilted pack n play sheets for babies fit this perfectly! I will be using those in addition to a blanket because she always gets the blanket off part of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: dmaemo

customer_reviews.title: Not a durable bed if your pup likes to burrow
customer_reviews.text: My puggle loved this bed...for five days. We used it in her crate and she started sleeping in there voluntarily with the door open because of how comfortable this bed was. However, she loves to burrow and due to the fabric being slightly loose over the padding, she dug a hole in the middle and we had to throw it out. We have not experienced this problem with other dog beds, and considering the price point, we are very disappointed. Also, I agree with other reviews that the cover is not waterproof, so if your dog has an accident or gets sick, you'll need to wash the entire bed.
customer_reviews.author: NRG3103

customer_reviews.title: My Pitbull loves her new bed.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it. It's easier for her to get up when she sleeps on her Memory dog bed than on the bare floor. It arrived on time and have not had issues with the cover. I've washed it several times now and it has stood up to the washer and dryer. Sturdy material and workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: MattyNemo

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, good value
customer_reviews.text: This is our third dog bed from this company (one for each of our 3 dogs), and we continue to be impressed with the quality, durability and value. The beds cover is water resistant even for a giant senior dog with giant incontinence. We got the extra cover for our own convenience and it was a good call for our circumstances. When our 160 lb Saint needed a new bed, I was glad to see this was still available. For our giant breed crew it was a reasonable expense, and lasted as long if not longer than the majority of beds. I highly recommend this as a good option for a very good bed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Starn

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver for Older Dogs
customer_reviews.text: This dog bed was a game changer for us. Our senior dog (age 15) became incontinent at night. After reading reviews we bought this bed and an extra cover. the bed is super soft and completely leak proof. We have washed the covers several times now and they wash and dry perfectly (others complained about the bottom falling apart and mold issues - we have none of that and had the product over a month with several washings). We did end up getting doggie diapers and this has made a huge difference too. I highly recommend this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bed!
customer_reviews.text: We have gone through numerous beds for our 7-year old 90 pound Golden Retriever/German Shepherd. This is by far the BEST bed all around. Our dog has arthritis and the extra cushioning really helps him. The cover washes beautifully. I air dry it most of the time after washing or just dry it in the dryer under low heat. It doesn't seem to stain. I hesitated buying this because of the cost. This bed has outlasted all of his previous beds combined. Worth the added cost. Quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Not reliably waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Pros - fits nicely in the kennel/crate and it seems comfortable for our dog. Cons - not waterproof for long. Our older dog had an accident right after buying it and it did not soak through. But this last time, we caught it within a few minutes and it had already soaked into the foam in several places, so the whole bed is garbage. I don't know if washing the cover reduces the effectiveness, but I only washed it once using cold water and hung it up to dry. I bought the bed 3 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: James B. Herndon

customer_reviews.title: The cover ripped on day 2!
customer_reviews.text: Love the bed, not the cover! My girl went to "nest" and ripped a hole in the cover on day 2. I flipped it over and put a blanket on top. She was still able to destroy it! Foam was everywhere...as you can see. We now have a tight pillowcase on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Braud

customer_reviews.title: Might be waterproof...not pee-proof
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this bed for 3 years and have been happy till now. My dog loves this bed. Yes, as another reviewer stated, the tiny black “nubs” on the bottom come off in the wash. Nbd for me. Waterproof from a wet dog, didn’t start smelling like wet dog after a rain shower. But-my neighbors dog care over for a play date and peed on the bed. Soaked through the cover and into the foam. I don’t have the facilities to clean it. It’s going in the trash. Next time I will not trust “waterproof “.
customer_reviews.author: Sunday

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Crate Pad
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pad for my dog's wire crate - it is very nice, soft and waterproof. The pad is quite thick and the cover beads water so that it doesn't absorb thru to the pad. However my review is based on ONE week's use because my dog destroyed it one day since he has some separation anxiety. So, chew-proof it is not, but if you need a good pad for your crate-trained dog, I recommend this pad.
customer_reviews.author: A. Ortega

customer_reviews.title: I've bought dozen of dog beds over the years and this is the best by far
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the quality of this bed. I've bought dozen of dog beds over the years and this is the best by far. Great quality for the price. I would recommend it especially for old arthritic dogs like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Strait

customer_reviews.title: Great support bed, cover is pretty thin.
customer_reviews.text: We have hardwood floors, so getting a dog bed that doesn't sink to the floor with weight on it is very important to us for our large breed dogs. I laid on the bed when it arrived and I didn't feel the hard floor underneath me. Two issues: 1. the bottom material is slick so the bed tends to slide around when the dogs jump on it. 2. Biggest issue for me is the cover is extremely thin. My dogs nails have put holes in the cover just from getting in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian STop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Wish I hadn't wasted the money.
customer_reviews.text: Also wish I had sent it back before the return window closed. My dog refuses to set foot on it, and the cover is flimsy as all get out and ripped already. I should have spent the money and gotten the dogbedorless , which I did for my larger dog. The dog I bought the Millard for skips it and goes into the larger dogs' crate. So I'll be buying the Dogbed4less, which also comes with a Waterproof Liner with Denim Cover and Bonus External Case. The millard will be going to the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Cee

customer_reviews.title: My Border Collie Thanks You!!!
customer_reviews.text: We own a ranch and have three Border Collies! Our 16 year old male has been “retired” from cattle duty and being my running buddy for the past few years due to failing eyesight and hearing, and has recently developed arthritis. We had tried two other brands of beds, hoping to make napping easy and comfortable. Both soon “squished”. One was so thin his weight was not fully supported; he is not overweight. This orthopedic bed has been the landing spot for all THREE of our Border Collies-at once!!!!! They love it! Holds their combined weight- all three at optimum weight, and is comfortable no matter the temperature. Deacon and Meggi and Glynnis say - Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: windborne energy, inc.

customer_reviews.title: Inferior quality!!  Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this same bed in 2015, or so I thought. Very disappointed!! The one from 2015 has held up incredibly well but I needed another. The original was 1 solid piece of 4” memory foam, this new one is 2 pieces of 2 inch foam glued together. The new one is much softer than the original and it probably will lose its thickness very quick. MAKE THESE LIKE BEFORE WITH 1 piece of 4” memory foam!!
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this bed
customer_reviews.text: Have a 13 lb Maltese who underwent knee repair surgery in February. Torn ACL/MCL/Meniscus and a few other issues - too much jumping up and down off couch. His athletic career is over - professional football will never happen for him now, but he takes solace in this bed. Seriously though, he loves this bed - we put it in his crate and leave the crate door open and I will be looking for him around the house and realize he put himself in the crate because the bed is so cozy and comfy. He enjoys being in his crate on this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Pate

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof, supportive bed for large dogs
customer_reviews.text: This large bed is AWESOME for our 67lb Black Lab mix. She is at least 13yrs old and has a leaky bladder. This bed is 4-5" thick and provides sturdy support for her old bones plus the cover is waterproof and washable!! We purchased the inside liners too because we use doggy chucks on top the bed to keep from washing so much. We also use chucks on the inside liner while the cover is being laundered. Works GREAT for our needs!! I recommend spending the money for this AWESOME PRODUCT - it's everything we've been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: K Fly

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, healthy way to sleep
customer_reviews.text: I just got a 4 month old Westie. Initially I had got him a soft bed I assumed he would like. Two weeks passed and he never slept one minute on it. So I guessed he must be like me : I like firm beds. I came on Amazon, found this one and ordered the small size. He liked it and slept on it the very first day. Even though he is a very small dog, I found the small size bed was way too small for him so I switched to the medium size. He sleeps on it every day and I am happy knowing he is sleeping comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Co&Be

customer_reviews.title: Bully Bliss on a Bed
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves her new bed. She's a 50 pound bulldog. I bought this to help with her aging joints and I definitely see an improvement in her getting around. It's a bit heavy and difficult to carry around the house but I wanted a big size for her.
customer_reviews.author: Drea C.

customer_reviews.title: No waterproof covering
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked to find there was no waterproof covering on the foam, but I covered the foam with a big garbage bag taped into place. My dog has a bed similar bed and his foam is encased in a waterproof covering. If this dog bed was supposed to be, I got a defective dog bed. For the positive news? It's good quality foam, the outside cover is easy to remove for washing and washes well and, most important of all, Jake LOVES this bed. It fits his medium sized crate perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Not that impressed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bed for my 11 year old lab/collie who suffers from arthritis. The bed he currently has is old and needed replaced. I've had the bed for 2 weeks now and he rarely uses it. When he does lay on it, he is usually on it for only 15 minutes at a time. While I really like the size of the Large one I purchased, I am going to try and find another bed like his old one so he can be more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: grdnrgal

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bed for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of these beds that i've bought in the last five years. Shop and compare prices and you won't find anything this nice and easy to clean....unzip the cover and throw it it the wash. My 14 year old black lab... 110 lbs... extra large bed fit him perfect and he seems to love it. you dont have to spend 200 for a good bed and its firm enough...even his old one was still firm but I thought ,for the money, and his age, he deserves a new one. You can read more if you want but I'd say quit wondering and just buy it. This my un-biased opinion and wouldn't hesitate to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Jury Still Out
customer_reviews.text: Jury is still out. Bed arrived yesterday. Looks good. No odor. Very comfy. BUT, I bought this because the Amazon write up said it was certified by CertiPUR-US. I hope it is. There are no labels on the item or enclosed signage to indicate this. In fact, the enclosure states it is made in China. If I'd realized that I might have skipped this product, however my dog has passed the chewing stage so I am ever hopeful that it is OK for him to use. I'm just saying - Made in China - Buyer Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Snow

customer_reviews.title: Excellent foam!
customer_reviews.text: The foam in this bed is outstanding!!! The cover did get a little tear in it, but I put some duct tape on the back side and it’s really holding up well. I got the tan, and it is showing some doggy dirt, but can zip off cover yo wash easily. love that the foam is such high quality for my old dog.
customer_reviews.author: ILMLover

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves her new bed!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a difficult time finding a bolster bed the size we need that provides softness and good support. I finally decided to try this bed under my dogs favorite bolster bed that unfortunately has very little padding underneath. She and I have been delighted with the result. She now has her bolster but thanks to this wonderful bed she has the softness and support of a great mattress. The texture of the thin cover keeps the top bed from moving and can easily be unzipped for washing. The one thing I would request of the manufacturer is to make a size that is 24 to 25 inches wide.
customer_reviews.author: ChiHealing

customer_reviews.title: Nice cushion, but not 4 inches high
customer_reviews.text: Our two dogs love this cushion! The length by width measurements were spot on, so it fits perfectly into our dog couch. On the flip side, the reason I gave it "4 stars" instead of 5 is because it's definitely not 4 inches high as described by the seller. Either way, our dogs don't discriminate and still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My elderly dog loves this.
customer_reviews.text: I have an elderly Jack Russell who is used to being on my very comfy bed. She is very fussy about comfort. She loves it. I bought this for the living room to put near the wood stove so my dog could stay warm. It is soft memory foam but it doesn't compress completely like less quality beds do. The cover is soft but not super soft. The bed always come back to shape when she gets off it. I haven't had to clean it yet but the cover is removable and machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: FaerylochTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice memory foam. Thick and firm for my dog with arthritis. You could feel the floor when sitting on the one I bought from the store. This one is much better. My dog loves it. The large size is larger than most other dog beds large sizes so pay attention to the measurements. I love that it's waterproof. My dog had surgery recently after we received this and he vomited and had an accident on it and the foam inside was completely dry. We washed it and it's good as new. It's also very easy to put the cover back on after washing because it unzips on two sides instead of just one.
customer_reviews.author: KBott

customer_reviews.title: One tiny flaw--can be overcome though
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I dropped a star was because it is supposed to be a waterproof cover and the velour part is, but the bottom is not. So if the top is soaked and you pick the bed up to unzip it, the fluid runs down the sides and to the bottom then soaks into the bed foam through the bottom of the cover. So since it's very difficult to find a waterproof bed/washable cover, I recommend this but if it does get soaked, leave it on floor and carefully unzip the cover and slide it off and fold the fluid in while lifting and carrying it away to the washing machine or sink.
customer_reviews.author: TrenaPT

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The product came on time and inflated within 24 hours. It appears to be well made, however firmer than our other dogs memory foam bed. Our dog Callie is suspicious of this new bed, preferring to sleep on Brandy Dog’s bed when she can get away with it. She will sleep on it at night but still sneaks onto our bed in the wee hours of the morning. The cat loves the bed however! Chasing the cat off might just be the trick to get Callie to take full possession of her new bed.
customer_reviews.author: audrey

customer_reviews.title: My Second...and they’re both wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second orthopedic memory foam bed from Milliard. I had purchased an extra large bed for my Golden’s, but found my “old guy” cockapoo was resting on it throughput the day. The larger bed is too big to use in the living room, and it’s difficult for my little buddy to get up on the sofa in the evening, so a bought a smaller one for beside my recliner. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mommajo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dog bed for the money
customer_reviews.text: This dog bed is so plush! it's soft and firm at the same time. I love how thick it is. it hasn't flattened under the weight of my dogs. the cover is super easy to remove and I throw it in my normal wash. Very easy to put back on as well. Overall very easy to care for. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As comfortable as my own 4” memory foam on my own bed!
customer_reviews.text: Our new puppy just slept on this fabulous mattress last night as her first night “home.” I was beyond excited when we received it because it is literally as comfortable as my 4” memory foam mattress on my own bed. I am super impressed with how well it’s made. The cover is easy to remove. Not sure of the waterproof part yet as we were lucky enough not to experience any accidents in her crate! HIGHLY recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jill Mock

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give this a better rating because it is so soft and my dog loved it for the first couple weeks, however he recently got sick while crated and when I unzipped the cover, it had soaked through to the foam. I don't even know how I'm going to clean the foam without it getting destroyed. The cover did come clean in the wash, but without the foam, it's useless. Bummed because I specifically bought this because it's lined with plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Bayley

customer_reviews.title: The kids (dogs) love these things.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and am very happy with them. I intended to use them on our outdoor patios and decks. But they may be too nice for that. So, for now, we scatter them around the house and they're often occupied. The cover fits nicely and seems durable. I like the multi-sided zipper for easy removal. The color is very neutral and works everywhere. Our adult dogs (male yellow lab, female rottweiler) are not bed wetters or destructive chewers so no insights there. Down the road we'll find out how well they hold up to rain, sun and morning fog.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this super soft and comfy orthopedic dog bed!
customer_reviews.text: This dog bed is easy to clean, soft and durable. I love the quality feel of the soft fabric and foam. A zipper makes the cover easy to remove and machine wash. This bed is a better value for your money compared to some other orthopedic beds. We are super satisfied with our purchase and you will be too. It fits snugly in a small size crate and my dog loves it! It's the only bed he doesn't chew on. I'd love it if more colors were available.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Bed
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this bed. We own four different orthopedic dog beds and this one is probably his favorite. I am buying a second one to replace his bed I currently keep in my home office. Also, we have owned this bed for two years and it's holding up very well. I have washed the cover several times, even using the sanitize washer setting a few times, and the cover is still in good shape. To dry the cover, I either air dry it, or use the dryer on low heat. Note: We have the XL size for our 75 lbs. German Shepherd Dog.
customer_reviews.author: Pie Man

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well
customer_reviews.text: My other beds fell apart because the dogs like to dig, these are 45 pound dogs. These are holding up very well. I really like how easy it is to remove the covers and replace. No problem at all and I am 65 years old and can struggle with bed bottom sheets. Also, NO SMELL in beds after 18 months and these are outside dogs that do not get bathed. I did notice dark discoloration on the foam, but NO SMELL so I do not let it bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a German Shepard that is getting older and wanted to get him a bed with more support and this bed far exceeded my expectations. A true memory foam, not like other seller claims to have. The bed came folded up in an air tight bag, once opened, it took a few minutes to expand with a nice thick height, before I was able to set it down for the dog. The xlarge is HUGE and gives my dog plenty of spread out room. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for geriatric dogs
customer_reviews.text: This dog bed is the best purchase we made for our 14 year old lab. She loves it & sleeps & rest on it constantly. Our gal has been in our family for 14 yrs and deserves something that helps support her & our vet recommended a memory foam type bed for her because of her arthritis & age. After many tries through other stores this is the winner. It fits her while leaving room for her little pals (a cat, two chihuahuas & akita) to nap along with her.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle H.

customer_reviews.title: The Dog Ate It  Day One
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I didn't get a chance to see how nice it was beyond the day we received it. It looked a well made, firm mattress that we thought the dog would enjoy. Sadly, he ate most of it the first night. Not a fault of the bed, but hard to rate since it didn't last long. I gave it 5 stars because that was my first impression. I thought it was a nice bed for the money. Too bad my grand dog chews everything in sight!
customer_reviews.author: Duck Lady

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: First I ordered the medium for my 40 lb Australian Shepard. I found it to be more like what I would consider a small and she didn't have room to stretch out so I returned it and got the next size up but that is actually too big. Would be nice if the medium was a bit bigger. Yes, they did provide measurements so it's not their fault. Just be careful to heed those measurements. I checked on Big Barker Jr. and they do provide a better size but we decided to stay with Milliard. The bed itself is fine...no issues and our dog does use it most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Rich

customer_reviews.title: A Bed You Can Count On!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I am allowed to do a second feedback, I loved this bed so much, I bought a second one, am just as happy as the first one a bought the previous week. The only thing i wished they would do, make the cover out of better material. The side is ripped from my dogs toe nail. How ever working all day, this bed relieves the pressure points of standing, or laying all day. This bed is soft yet durable. I was so impressed. With this bed, I can promise you won't be sending it back, but ordering more if you have another dog! Thank you for such a well made bed!!! Improve the cover!
customer_reviews.author: RhondaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My puppy loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: We have an older dog that is suffering from arthritis and mast cell tumors. He was used to sleeping on the bed, but now can't get up on to it. He was sleeping on the floor and tossed and turned a lot throughout the night. He would also moan often. Now he lays on his new bed all night comfortably. He seems to have more energy in the morning and moves better. I was unsure about spending this much on a dog bed, because the cheap ones we had bought him over the years were of no interest to him. This one he uses every night. Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: We sleep on a foam temperpedic bed and love it. That's why I bought this for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this was really worth it. My dog is 15 years old, and at night he often forgets and pees wherever he is -- no matter how late we make his last walk. So he had to be banished to a gated bathroom. But his old bed was too soft, I could see that. We sleep on a foam temperpedic bed and love it. That's why I bought this for the dog. It feels just like our bed. It keeps him off the cool floor, supports him well. And he seems to love it. So I sleep better, too!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Savage

customer_reviews.title: These are great beds. I've ordered about 5 of them over ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great beds. I've ordered about 5 of them over the past several years. We have two dogs and we have them scattered through most rooms. It is the only bed my dogs will pick over the couch or our bed! My senior dogs loved them too. Now my young dogs love them! Worth the money. The pic doesn't show them on the bed just shows how cute they are! Also, my huge mastiff fits very well on the xl with plenty of room and even the large. She has to curl a bit on the large.
customer_reviews.author: J. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Supportive for my 18lb elderly dog. Sometimes his 15 lb sister joins him on it and they both fit.
customer_reviews.text: This bed was bought for my elderly dogs and seems to be comfortable for them. They prefer my lap but when they lay on it they rest comfortably and the foam is supportive enough that they can get up without a struggle, unlike their previous bed. I have had to remove the cover and wash it once when one had an accident, the cover washed well and didn't stain and dried on low heat without shrinkage. The cover also stopped any leakage through to the actual foam on the bed. I bought an additional cover and I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: sugar magnolia

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it...
customer_reviews.text: I only buy memory foam beds for my dogs these days because that's the only thing I've found that doesn't go flat or lumpy after a short time. I bought this for my 5 month old Border Collie and she loves it. It also fits her crate perfectly. As soon as I put it in there she climbed in to check it out and laid right down and took a nap on it. Being waterproof is a nice touch as well and the zippered cover is easy to remove and wash. Great bed, just keep in mind if your dog or puppy is a chewer/shredder these beds are not indestructible, most beds aren't!
customer_reviews.author: CAfarmgirlTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the large size for our ~70 lb lab. We've had it for 6+ months now, and it's wonderful. The large is a bit more than he needs, so we are going to get a medium for his second bed. My only complaint is that the non-slip dots on the bottom of the cover come off in the wash. Our dog's only complaint is that the cats like to steal it from him. Overall, this bed is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jammer

customer_reviews.title: After a few days our dogs preferred this bed compared to their usual beds. Good support and cushioning.
customer_reviews.text: Dogs like it and that's good enough for me! We ordered this bed because it gives more support and cushioning which our dogs are starting to need. The sizing charts, listing breeds for each size, is a very good reference if you're undecided on size. Based on their sizing compared to breed, the bed will offer enough room for Fido to stretch all the way out if they like. One of our dogs prefers beds that have sides, so it took a few days for him to choose this bed over his usual bed. However, it's become his bed of choice. That's a good enough review for me.
customer_reviews.author: Musicbookfan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My 2 French Bulldogs love this bed as there is plenty of room for both of them to stretch out and sleep while I'm working on my computer. I bought a large size so they can mess around and play on it as well. Before I got this bed they were squeezing onto a one dog bed, it was sad but hilarious. I highly recommend this thick comfortable bed for any animal.
customer_reviews.author: Rcassata

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product. While no dog bed cover on the market is truly waterproof, these covers are water resistant and will prevent strike through if the wetness is immediately noticed. I have a paralyzed dog with bladder control issues. I simply wrapped the memory foam portion in plastic garbage bags, and then placed the removable cover over that. It is highly functional and has been working perfectly. I bought a large number of replacement covers so that I can simply swap out the dirty covers as often as is necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Ellis

customer_reviews.title: She likes it!
customer_reviews.text: We are spending the winter in our camper. My girl is a 60 lb boxer, lab mix. Not a small dog. She had a bigger bed, but it takes up too much space. I bought the medium for her and she seems to really like it. She fits fine on it. Also it's easy to vacuum and pretty light compared to her other beds. I may buy her a large one for the house. Also she doesn't bottom out on it. It's real foam not the shredded stuff they put in other beds. I definitely would buy again. Because of the light weight it's easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: oricurn

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable bed. I have laid on it with the dog to calm her and it was super comfy. We have already had accidents and I was thrilled that even with urine that ran under the bed all I had to do was hose it off and let the cover dry. Nothing inside got wet at all. Easy to wipe clean with a rag also for dirt stains. Only wish I have is that I could get it in other colors that would complement the room where it sits. I am not a fan of tan colors.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rhew

customer_reviews.title: Great bed fits soft crate
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we have owned. First one an XL has lasted through two covers and still going strong. The Medium fits perfectly inside of the Amazonbasics soft dog crate. 36”x24”. The covers are sturdy and hold up to wetness pretty good. Easy to take off and throw in the wash. Only warning is the small dots for grip on the bottom start to come off in the dryer so don’t use heat unless you want to vacuum out the dryer or have small dots in your laundry for weeks. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: On Target

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product a couple months ago. My two dogs did not warm up to it right away, but now they love it. As for the review, I wanted to wait to review it until I had to wash it. I can tell you I washed it yesterday, did not dry it in the dryer, let hang over outside chairs for a couple hours, put it back on the foam. It went back on with no shrinking, no hassle with the zipper......good as new. Don't hesitate to buy this. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Derek F.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dog/cat bed, and so does my crew! I have bought a lot of different pet beds, but this is by far the favorite choice by all. It is very thick and mine is definitely memory foam. This fits both of my medium dog crates perfectly. I will definitely be ordering more. I washed the cover when I first received it, while letting the mattress part air out a bit. I dried it on low heat cycle & it came out very nice. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Good dog bed
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. This bed (XL) fits both my golden retriever and border collie at the same time - though the bc would prefer if the gr wouldn’t try to cuddle her all the time lol. Individually it’s plenary big with room to spare. They both seem to like it and the cats claim it when the dogs vacate so seems like a winner to me. Big fan of the waterproofing as that’s caused numerous bed replacements in the past, really happy for the option to purchase additional replacement covers.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bed at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this bed for a week now and seldom do we find Rigley lying anywhere else. He has a history of chewing beds and tearing blankets so we were worried this would be destroyed in a matter of days. He loves to dig (as do most Brittany spaniels) and is scratching the bed, but so far, this bed is holding up extremely well. We are very pleased with the quality and firmness of the bed. In fact, I just ordered a second one for our chihuahua so she doesn't keep stealing Rigley's bed. This is a photo of Rigley. He is approximately 35 lbs and his bed is a size medium.
customer_reviews.author: mpchristian

customer_reviews.title: Coco finally likes a doggy bed!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is fancy. I mean he is diva fancy. He sleeps on my bed, he eats fresh boiled chicken and does not like walking on grass. So, any ordinary dog bed was gonna work for him. I've bought him 3 other beds before, but he would just smell and ignore. This one, however, he smelled for a while, laid his head on it first, liked how firm it was and got on it for a good nap! He always nags me at around 10pm to make us go to sleep because he wants to lay on my mattress, now he nags me less until he resigns to this little mattress. So happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Yesica Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bed
customer_reviews.text: I was so nervous about ordering dog beds online, without being able to touch them. I was so happy when I received this bed. It's of excellent quality and is exactly as described. The cover material is soft and appears to be durable. I did what the seller suggests, which is to let them sit out for 24 hours after unpacking (in a room where the dogs won't mess with them); they plump up and become the size you ordered. I had no smell issues at all; I know some foam does smell but these didn't. Thank you for a great product; I'll be gettin' all my dog beds from this company!
customer_reviews.author: d1e1b1

customer_reviews.title: Cover tears
customer_reviews.text: Softness is great. No complaints there. However, after the first wash, following all directions, the cover tore and is no longer water proof/resistant. I had to use duck tape to fix it which should be fun at the next wash. Quality scores low.
customer_reviews.author: JulieBean

customer_reviews.title: Bosco Loves It!!
customer_reviews.text: My dog Bosco sleeps on this mat every night now, which is unusual for him since he used to wander all around the house to sleep, and sometimes still does. But he clearly likes this new bed and hasn't chewed it all to bits like he did with his last low quality bed. It is a high quality dog bed! It's hard to imagine anything that would better suited for such an important job!!
customer_reviews.author: William D. Fusfield

customer_reviews.title: turned out to be a very expensive garbage filler
customer_reviews.text: Update: I will be throwing this out. The mattress absorbs and hold odors making the mattress unusable. My dog will no longer go on the bed. Went to Costco and bought one of their beds. Lesson learned and problem solved. Original post: This bed is amazing. My puppy laid down the first night and I didn’t hear her tossing and turning all night. I took a king size sheet, folded it in half the wrapped the bed, tucking the excess underneath. My pup wasn’t able to get to the mattress and as of now, hasn’t chewed on the mattress cover. I will definitely be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Thick and Comfy Dog Bed
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this dog bed purchase. It came rolled up, but quickly filled out to the advertised dimensions (solid 4" thick) and fits perfectly in our dog crate. Better than average materials and looks like it will hold up well to washing. The kids and dog both love laying on it. We will update this review if it doesn't hold up over time, but so far it's great.
customer_reviews.author: MontanaClan

customer_reviews.title: My dog is 12 and in very good shape, I needed to replace one of her ...
customer_reviews.text: Bed is a weird size as someone else said. The next size down would have been too small. No smell, it puffed up right away. My dog is 12 and in very good shape, I needed to replace one of her beds & I am happy with this & she seems to be as well. She didn't circle at all, just laid down, she got up without any stiffness. We have ALL hardwood floors, her old bed was almost the same as laying on the floor & I noticed twice it looked like a leg feel asleep from her laying on it all night. She gets right up from this one no trouble at all. :)
customer_reviews.author: Laura.

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof as advertised
customer_reviews.text: These beds are great! I have an very elderly dog with urinary incontinence and these beds do not absorb the urine. I purchased two. I spray one down and let it dry while I use the second. Cleans up great allowing my old lady to stay a little cleaner. She also appears to love the comfort of the memory foam. I have tried a lot of different beds and options trying to deal with this problem and these beds are the answer! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Great cushion. I wish my cats liked it.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it 3 stars because *I* like it. 3 successive cats have not. It's a nice memory foam, with a removable cover. It's a good size. My 19# cat could have sprawled out on it with ease...if he would lay on it. It has no discernable memory foam smell, and is thick enough to provide some insulation from the floor. It's also firm enough not to completely squish to nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Caroli

customer_reviews.title: great buy!! Milliard Premium Orthopedic Memory Foam Dog bed size XL.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these in XL, 1 for a 100lb Akita and 1 for a 90lb German Shepard. They both love them and have plenty of room to spread out. The cover is soft, there is no smell to the beds (from the material or liner) and it seems to keep the shape. We do have a blanket over the German Shepard's bed due to joint issues but again its not necessary. I would highly recommend this product for any dog. It seems to help dogs with joint issues and our Akita actually loves his bed and he is young and healthy.
customer_reviews.author: teri

customer_reviews.title: Best waterproof bed I’ve found!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed! Between my older dog and a cat who occasionally likes to pee on the dog bed, I can say that it is waterproof! I’ve had it for a few months now and have washed the cover several times and it’s holding up great! Some covers the plastic waterproofing breaks down in the wash but not this bed. Every time someone has an accident I unzip the cover expecting to see stains and so far nothing! It’s also very think and super comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Harthorn

customer_reviews.title: Our Aging/broken Cavalier is very HAPPY!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bed for our aging and very broken Cavalier. He injured himself jumping off the couch, couldn't walk and in a lot of pain. The Vet recommended complete rest along with other medications. We had a dog bed, but I wanted to get something more orthopedic. He LOVES it! It has kept him so very comfortable! Wish I had ordered/new about this years ago to ensure that he is sleeping comfortably. It rolled out, and puffed up within hours. There was a slight smell that dissipated soon after opening.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Second Purchase; Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m embarrassed to say that my dog has 9 beds - he's a very tough customer. I bought my first Milliard bed several months ago, but I measured wrong and it was a little too big for the space I intended it to fit. It didn’t matter because it quickly became my dog’s favorite. The memory foam doesn’t break down, and the cover doesn’t degrade when it is cleaned. I just bought my second bed to replace one of the other inferior beds because he loves this one so much, and it has held up so well.
customer_reviews.author: Adam A

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof!
customer_reviews.text: Not water proof! My dog had an accident for the first time since I brought this, now the memory foam smells of urine after I cleaned it as recommended. I even cleaned the foam which started to break down and it still smells. For this reason I don't recommend spending almost $70.00 on this. Comfort wise it's been great after a year and a half. Literally stinks I have to replace this for a reason I thought wasn't going to be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie Q

customer_reviews.title: A New Happy Place
customer_reviews.text: ...I can hear her snoring from across the room. Hannah is 73', a golden lab/St. Bernard mix. She joined us a few months ago, and at 8, came with some habits. Her bones definitely prefer a cushion and the warmth that comes with a raised platform. She is very content with the bed, the cover slips off easily to clean, and we'd probably put one in each of three rooms if I felt like i could spend the money. She probably would have fit on a medium - this is the large bed - but it is a kick to see her sprawled out on it too. Room for her and her visiting friends. Good, solid, smart purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joenne

customer_reviews.title: Cover is not waterproof!!
customer_reviews.text: Please know the cover IS NOT waterproof. The bed is two pieces of foam glued together making it impossible to really clean the foam of urine in the event of an accident (our case, storms + nervous bladder). We have had this since March and while our Corgi likes the bed, it is now trash because we cannot clean the foam due to the cover not actually being waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Hall

customer_reviews.title: Good unless your dog likes to fluff and dig a spot to lay down
customer_reviews.text: My belgian malinois shredded up two of these things in a matter of weeks. He seemed to love sleeping on it and I noticed he had less of a gait (knee surgery, arthritic, on pain meds) after a few nights on it, but he is one of those dogs that tries to "dig a hole" before lying down and at the cost of replacement I simply had to switch to an elevated bed with a sturdier canvas type material.
customer_reviews.author: J. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Bought one. Torn up after 2 months of use. Bought another. Lasted not even a day.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed in medium size for my pup, figuring he'll grow into it. It worked well for about 2 months, but once he reached 30 lbs, he tore up the cover. Purchased a replacement cover, he tore it up while nesting and shredded the mattress. A week later, figuring the dog has learned his lesson, purchased another one, this time with 2 extra covers just in case. Day 1, first cover is destroyed. Day 2, new cover, seemed okay. Day 3, dog tore it up. Day 4, new cover... another hole, destroyed mattress. I'm done. The bed itself is comfy. Very comfortable. However, the cover it comes with doesn't last at all.
customer_reviews.author: Felixx

customer_reviews.title: Great first impression!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bed arrived yesterday, rolled up. As with all memory foam type items after shipping = let it sit for 24 hours. A little while ago I took it into the room where my dog sleeps at night. He sat on it, I asked him to lie down, then he appeared in the living room, fetched a chew toy and disappeared back to the new bed in the other room. He NEVER likes to be in another room unless we are all going to bed for the night. I'd say this is a 5 paw review!
customer_reviews.author: eldeetx

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort but gets too warm
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this pad but constantly gets on it and off it and on it and off it. I think it makes him too hot. It is great for his aching muscles but I honestly think it retains his body heat and he gets too hot. I have a favorite pillow that does the same thing. I love it for the comfort but half way through the night I throw it on the floor and grab another one. If there is anyone out there that has found a solution to this problem please let me know if you have been able to find something better.
customer_reviews.author: Bernice H. Olson

customer_reviews.title: My spoiled dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to spoil my bourgeois dog and get him a memory foam bed. He now sleeps through the night in his crate and doesn’t try to bother me on the couch or in bed. Thank goodness because his farts are bad enough to gag a pig. Highly recommended. Especially if you own a stuck up bourgeois extra large breed dog.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bed. We have one for our 1
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bed. We have one for our 1.5 year old boxer who weighs over 70 lbs. I wanted to get one for our younger and very pregnant boxer as well, so they each have their own as they are side sleepers and like to sprawl out. The bed arrived rolled up (very much like human memory foam mattresses are packaged. There was NO smell at all and although the female is still sleeping with us at night, she has lay on the mattress is her ready to go whelping bed. I am sure that she will be happy to lie on it when the puppies arrive and she is nursing for 3 or so weeks!
customer_reviews.author: stevie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my older dog with arthritis!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, quality, shipping and a very happy/lazy dog! Have a 50lb husky and a mixed breed, the husky stole this bed in 2 seconds! Would have got another, but my mixed breed is smaller and has been glued to a makeshift bed I made her when she was small. Don't see many better for the price, just as comfortable as a real human mattress, even fell asleep on it once, lol!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us and our new "pony."
customer_reviews.text: We thought we wanted to rescue a little lap dog but we fell in love with a beautiful but huge cocker spaniel, age 12. He needed a large bed and I quickly "clicked" on the orthopedic one because of his age. We "made do" with old blankets, etc for a few days until it arrived. Ringo loved his new bed instantly. Still does. The bed is too large for the space...and Ringo...so we sharply bent up one end and shoved it against the wall. Instant headboard! Everybody is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not washable!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a nice bed for my aging 8 year old dog. Although she loves it because it's comfortable, she's also been experiencing some incontinence as a spayed female and had a minor accident on it. I decided to hand wash it because from previous reviews others have mentioned that throwing it into the washer is a terrible idea because it falls apart. Well, it was a nightmare even to hand wash and leave out to dry. I eventually had to throw it out. We only had it for 2 weeks! SUCKS This is a good product if your dog NEVER really gets it dirty or has an accident on it and you only spot clean it to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: bher

product_meta.title: Milliard Premium Orthopedic Memory Foam Dog Bed with Anti-Microbial Removable Waterproof Washable Non-slip Cover
product_meta.description:
Size:MediumUnsurpassed Quality
The MILLIARD Premium Orthopedic Memory Foam Dog Bed offers your pet the contour support and comfort featured in human memory foam mattresses. The mattress is constructed of 2 layers for a medium-firm feel: A 2" layer of 3 pound memory foam for an amazingly soft feel over two inches of high density foam base. The foam foundation adds support and durability so that the bed will not sag or sink in the middle. The bed includes a removable, water-resistant, washable zipper cover for moisture protection and easy care. The cover's underside features a non-slip bottom which grip to the floor for maximum safety. Our Orthopedic Dog Beds were manufactured with your pet's comfort in mind for the ultimate sleep experience.

Product highlights
*High Quality memory foam contours to your dog's body to offer maximum support
*Waterproof and washable cover zips along two sides for easy on and off
*Orthopedic Memory Foam Dog Bed is CertiPUR Certified
*Great for your dog or cat's pet crate
*Washable and waterproof cover - ideal for older or aging dogs
feature_bullets: COMFORT - The Milliard 4" Dog Bed offers the perfect combination of support and luxe comfort by combining a sturdy foam base with a luxe memory foam layer.
QUALITY - Made from durable materials and superior workmanship for a longer lasting bed.
CONVENIENCE - The washable cover zips off and goes in the washing machine for easy care.
TESTED- The rubber grips on the underside of the cover are non-slip, and all our foam is certified by CertiPUR to be low VOC and free of heavy metals.
SIZE - The medium dog bed measures 34in.x22in.x4in.
